summary: MissionEditorDialog.tsx shows the task input section being placed immediately after the title/header, aligning with the requested layout change. However, the diff also includes non-layout logic changes in MissionEditorDialog.tsx and modifies additional files outside the allowed scope.

hallucinated_features.description: Modified files outside the strictly allowed scope (changes are not limited to frontend/src/components/MissionEditorDialog.tsx).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest constraints require limiting changes strictly to the New Mission creation form layout in MissionEditorDialog.tsx and not changing other files.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed task ID assignment logic when adding a task (compute max taskId and increment) rather than keeping existing task creation behavior unchanged.
hallucinated_features.reason: Non-goal explicitly disallows changing task creation logic, task IDs, or persistence behavior; this appears to alter how taskIds are determined.

hallucinated_features.description: Added a defensive deep copy of tasks before mutation submission.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; goes beyond the stated requirement to only reposition the task entry section in the dialog layout.
